title: Omnipresent God of War - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Supernatural   Xuanhuan
tags: Antihero Protagonist   Cheats   Clever Protagonist   Cultivation   Depictions of Cruelty   Determined Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hidden Abilities   Insects   Male Protagonist   Proactive Protagonist   Ruthless Protagonist   Time Skip   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: Get Lost   滚开
description:
In the desolate land in the last days, the third year of the Age of Sects. The world is in chaos, and the people have no way to make a living. 

The Central Dynasty had collapsed, and the various regions were divided into groups and independent sects. The Demonic sects are causing trouble in the shadows and the gangs were fighting against each other, causing chaos everywhere. 

The people are struggling for hope and salvation as they suffer from drought, cold, heavy rain, and insects. Amid the chaos, various sects have emerged to fight for resources and land to establish their own rule. Some ambitious people try to sweep the world and establish a dynasty, while some righteous people try to save the commoners and rebuild their homes. 

The Physique, Martial Arts, Immortal Arts, a Martial Arts powerhouse, and fame equal to the Buddha. 

Wei He holds the Pojing Bead that can help him breakthrough, traveling through the chaotic world and creating his own legend step by step.>
